column4: is it possible to cancel a package download part way through, while still installing the packages that were already downloaded, as long as their deps were downloaded too?
it has taken all day to get this far, but there are still 2 more hours to go in downloading time
is it possible to have it find faster downloads?  it averages at 60kB/s
everyone and their dog is attempting to download/upgrade Ubuntu at this minute...
um... because the new shiny just came out and everyone wants it?
away from release times, the Ubuntu repositories are pretty fast. At release time, not so much.
apt-torrent would be kind of cool, though.
you can do an upgrade in place
no, it's the GUI that manages updates & upgrades
System->About Ubuntu will give you a version number/name
